name: code-mantra
description: Remind yourself of programming principles with customizable notifications

codeMantra.enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable or disable Code Mantra notifications.

---

When enabled, Code Mantra will show programming principle reminders based on your configured triggers.

codeMantra.triggers.markdownDescription:
Configure when notifications should appear.

---

**Available Triggers:**
- `onSave`: When saving files (recommended)
- `onEdit`: While editing with delay
- `onOpen`: When opening files
- `onFocus`: When editor gains focus

codeMantra.fileTypes.markdownDescription:
List of language IDs to show notifications for.

---

**Supported Languages:**
- Web: `typescript`, `javascript`, `html`, `css`, `scss`, `vue`, `svelte`
- Systems: `rust`, `go`, `c`, `cpp`, `csharp`
- Mobile: `swift`, `kotlin`, `dart`
- General: `python`, `java`, `ruby`, `php`
- Data: `yaml`, `json`

**Tip:** You can add or remove languages from this list using the UI.

codeMantra.excludePatterns.markdownDescription:
Glob patterns to exclude files/directories from notifications.

---

**Examples:**
- `**/node_modules/**` - Exclude node_modules
- `**/dist/**` - Exclude build output
- `**/*.test.ts` - Exclude test files
- `**/vendor/**` - Exclude vendor directory

**Glob Patterns:**
- `**` matches any number of directories
- `*` matches any characters except `/`
